translations: v.属于（belong 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.translation: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

sentences.sentence: Real power belongs to the few.
sentences.translation: 真正的权力掌握在少数人手中。

sentences.sentence: She belongs to the Labour Party.
